unit_rules.name: Alpha Warrior
unit_rules.text: While leading a unit, all weapons equipped by models in the unit have +[Sustained Hits 1]+.

unit_rules.name: Death Blow
unit_rules.text: If this model is destroyed by a melee attack, and it has not yet been Activated this Battle Round, roll d6. On a 4+, it fights back before being removed from play.
